**Creating Blog Posts with the CMS**
- Go to `dabigshow.ch/admin` and log in. - Zerst bruchsch n invite wo mer dir a dini email schicked
- Fill in the fields:
  - TAGS: enter in tag names separated by commas and spaces. Ex: `gatsby, graphql, pollution, healthcare, ` etc. 
  - PUBLISHED: toggle the switch to the on position if you want to publish to the live website.
  - DATE: leave the current date and time, or click to bring up the date picker.
  - TITLE: enter your post's title. Ex: `My First Post` `ninja monkeys found in the amazone` etc.
  - BODY: enter your post's main body content, either in Markdown or in Rich Text.
- Click 'Publish'

- published: am beste zerst nöd bis s paar lüüt glese hend...

- date: brucht kei veränderig

- title: n titel z.b. `unglaublich, Putin wiedergewählt` oder `Vice - Sellout or great?` - eifach öbbis

https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/ da heds info wie mer das benutzt.

klick uf publish zums speichere




- Für n Pull request das beachte.
To make a new tag, create a new "label" in `config.js`, find a suitable svg icon, and paste the svg path in as the value for the "name" property of the label. Have a look at the existing labels in the `config.js` file and all should soon be clear. A good place to look for svg icons is at [simple icons](https://simpleicons.org/).
